prod_desc: Take a break with Anna and her horse on their journey!
prod_long_desc:
Enter the world of Disney Frozen and join Anna as she takes a break on her journey to visit her sister. With a feeding station for her horse and a campfire to make hot chocolate, they have everything they need to rest and refuel. The sleeping shelter has an opening function for easy play inside. Includes an Anna mini-doll, plus her horse.
Includes an Anna mini-doll figure in coronation outfit, plus her horse.
Features a shelter with an opening roof and a bed, a horse feeding station with hay bales to sit on, and a campfire.
Feed the horse, enjoy the campfire and make some hot chocolate.
Get a good night's sleep, then put the saddle on Anna's horse and continue your adventures!
Accessory elements include a map, chocolate and a cup.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 5-12.
Shelter measures over 2” high, 3” wide and 3” long.
Horse feeding station measures over 3” high, 3” wide and 1” long.
